name: Descendant (Eshkova - Bloodmoon Pictures)
description:
Descendant: Dont let it out.

You are Flint Cloud, and after a terrible event you must prevent something from getting out into the world. can you prevent it from escaping? Can you pick together all the clues? Or even reach the secret ending?

this is a small horror game with a focus on management and secrets throughout the game for the player to discover, sometimes with help of the main gameplay other times entirely seperated from the main game flow.

This is my first game that i published, based on an idea to stir mystery and cause theories, and i may even consider making a sequel at some point to answer the questions that i opened up!
